name: Headspace (Jestercraft)
description:
HEADSPACE"Top-down shooter, where pen & paper imagination comes to life"

Headspace is a "top-down shooter" -game where you dive deep into the imagination of young kid. Pen and paper environment comes to life and you're responsible of cleaning the level from various blockades!

Game is made by young game developers, who attended the Jestercraft "Jester Academy" -programme in Jyväskylä, Finland. The developers had never done a game with Unity before, and this is the creation they managed to make within three months!

Join Jestercraft Discord: https://discord.gg/hdZXeMJ

Jestercraft Homepage: http://jestercraft.com
